How can I make myself a monthly

FDV mission partitioner?
How beautiful on the mountains are the feet of those who bring good news, who proclaim peace, who bring good tidings, who proclaim...

data.title: HOW CAN I BECOME A MONTHLY SPONSOR OF FTC MISSIONS?
data.content:
How beautiful on the mountains are the feet of those who proclaim peace, how necessary the knees of those who pray and intercede for them, and how important are those hearts that are ready to give with joy and liberality so that the work of God may be carried on.

Become a monthly sponsor and give $10 $20 $50 $100 or $200 with automatic debit. It's easy, fast, convenient, it will make a difference. Sign up today!

Visit our missions page to sign up as a sponsor: www.everyhearthealed.com or contact Sister Liliana Valencia at (909) 822-5450 or lilianavalencia@fountainoftruth.com

CLICK HERE AND JOIN THE VISION - BECOME A SPONSOR.
